name.zh_CN: 快速将产品导入您的商店- Transifii

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly import products with SEO optimized content to your stores. Supporting Amazon, Tmall, Aliexpress, Alibaba, etc.
short.zh_CN: Transifii 一键优化导入产品，产品标题和描述的 SEO 优化，支持亚马逊、天猫、阿里巴巴、淘宝、京东等供应商

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using Transifii, you can effortlessly import top-selling products from Amazon, Tmall, Aliexpress, Alibaba, and JD.com to your Shopify store with a single click. It synchronizes intelligent multilingual translations for imported products, aiding in SEO optimization of titles and descriptions to comply with Shopify guidelines while enhancing Google indexing and ranking. This ensures alignment with local consumer context, culture, and preferences—all achieved with just a few simple clicks. Whether you need to rapidly test a large volume of products or import hot-selling items from platforms like Amazon, Tmall, Aliexpress, and more into your Shopify store, Transifii can save you significant time and costs.

1. Seamlessly import products from platforms like Amazon, AliExpress, Tmall, and others directly into your Shopify store, without the need for additional tools or spreadsheets, streamlining the onboarding process and reducing editing efforts.
2. Intelligent conversion to local languages during import (multiple language options available) ensures that product descriptions align with local culture and consumer preferences.
3. Automatic optimization of product titles and descriptions for improved Google indexing and ranking.
4. Built-in editor allows for secondary edits of product descriptions, prices, models, categories, and more.
